Definition: Given a review from Amazon and a category of the product, generate "True" if the given review and its category match, otherwise generate "False".

Positive Examples.input:
Review: Arrived broken. Manufacturer defect. Two of the legs of the base were not completely formed, so there was no way to insert the casters. I unpackaged the entire chair and hardware before noticing this. So, I'll spend twice the amount of time boxing up the whole useless thing and send it back with a 1-star review of part of a chair I never got to sit in. I will go so far as to include a picture of what their injection molding and quality assurance process missed though. I will be hesitant to buy again. It makes me wonder if there aren't missing structures and supports that don't impede the assembly process. 
 Category: furniture
Positive Examples.explanation: It's the correct category. Because the customer gives a review of the product which belongs to the furniture category, which we can see it from the way the customer describes his experience sharing how he unpackaged his chair.

Positive Examples.input:
Review: the cabinet dot were all detached from backing... got me 
 Category: home_improvement
Positive Examples.explanation: It's the correct category. Because the product belongs to the home_improvement category, we can see it in the review where the customer mentions a cabinet dot.

Positive Examples.input:
Review: I got this with 50% charge. Put it under the sun. two days later, it has 25%. Never able to charge it once. Should have returned it right away. 
 Category: utensils
Positive Examples.explanation: It's an incorrect category. Because the product belongs to the electronics category and not utensils. Because the customer shared his experience related to the charging issue.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: Took way too long for these seeds to arrive and for only a single one to germinate is even more disappointing! Not worth the $ 
 Category: gardening
Negative Examples.explanation: It's only supposed to generate True or False.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: This was the third pair that I returned because they did not fit (the first two pairs were the same size). I received a full refund for those, but not for these! I WILL NEVER BUY FROM THEM, AGAIN!!! EVER! 
 Category: shoes
Negative Examples.explanation: The product belongs to shoes category. So, the answer should be True.

Negative Examples.input:
Review: Junk never work just damaged the brick 
 Category: home_improvement
Negative Examples.explanation: It should either return True or False not both.

Instances.input:
Reviews: Purchased this product in late April. Worked fine when first received, but since the weather is warmer now does not work well at all. Do not purchase if you live in warm weather 80's unless you plan on leaving your air conditioner on. Manual in box says does not work well in warm weather that it works better in cold weather. Amazon was no help in returning item. 
 Category: kitchen

Reviews: The speaker is alright for the price, but the turntable is so small, my records are rubbing against where the needle is held in place and warping the sound of my records. Would not waste your money when the vinyl doesn't even properly fit on the turntable. Pretty disappointed in the product. 
 Category: office_product

Reviews: I bought 2 sim card from this First one I had too call to activate because it said that my amazon order # is incorrect. Then, the customer service sent an emailed to different departments to solved it. Second sim card I had to call them too because is had the same problem like the first one. However, they said that I have to take the screenshot by myself and send it to different department to solve it, he didn’t even want to do it while he can. This sim card from this company too complicated to activate, and the customer service is very bad. 
 Category: sports

Reviews: I love style of the dress but the quality is so bad I can't understand it. One star because I think you have to work real hard to make a dress so poorly sewn together that the seams fall apart like that so easily. the bodice and skirt were nearly completely detached after one gentle wash. I had to hot glue a thin ribbon around the seam to salvage this dress. So annoyed by that. The dress also runs very very large. I use a dress clip to cinch it. And the color bleeds like crazy. Wash very gently in very cold water. 
 Category: apparel

Reviews: When I plug these earbuds in, I can hear a periodic loud beep coming from the headphones so I know that they can transmit noise, but my iPhone 8 does not recognize them. I plug them into the lightning port while my music is playing and the music continues to go through the phone speakers, no sound at all is transmitted through the earbuds from my phone. I can’t find them via Bluetooth, I’ve tried on multiple phones, so they are useless. The item is ineligible for exchange or return, so I’m out $12. Don’t waste your money 
 Category: wireless

Reviews: Won’t work in my license plate light socket. When I opened them there was solder stuck to the side of the base so that one wouldn’t go in to the socket. Then the others just won’t work in the socket. I’m sure the socket works as I removed a working light from it to install the LED bulb. 
 Category: automotive

Reviews: I purchased this before reading all of the reviews. Don’t purchase this, a waste of time and money. Vacuum coming into the valve on my truck is 18 but only 10 coming out which is not enough to shift the 4 wheel locking hubs. When tested no leaks because gage hooked directly to the valve so these are accurate reading. I did not send the valve back because based on other reviews would be a waste of time. Don’t try to save money by purchasing this valve, pay more and get something that works. 
 Category: lawn_and_garden

Reviews: Followed simple instructions but components would not communicate. Attempted 3 times. There are no troubleshooting procedures to follow if the installation is unsuccessful. 
 Category: home_improvement
